snippet: The video game culture has propelled the creation of escape rooms, immersive events that require audience members to solve puzzles and influence dramatic outcomes.
abstract: Chris Suellentrop Critic's Notebook notes escape rooms, immersive theater experience in which participants try to solve puzzle of how to escape from locked room, have arrived in New York after years of popularity in Asia; says makers of such games are trying to bring fun of video games into real life.
lead_paragraph: The video game culture has propelled the creation of escape rooms, immersive events that require audience members to solve puzzles and influence dramatic outcomes.

headline.main: In Escape Rooms, Video Games Meet Real Life
headline.print_headline: Gaming Culture Seeps Into Escape Rooms
